sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RITTERHUSIUS (Conrad), a learned German civilian, born at Brunſwick in 1560. He was pro-feſſor of civil law at Altdorf, and publiſhed a variety of works, particularly as a civilian ; together with an edition of Oppian in Greek and Latin : he was moreover an excellent critic ; his notes upon many eminent authors having been inſerted in the heft editions of them. He died in 1613.
